name: Kelvin
info: A Sinner who is adept at Magic Output. Freezes an enemy for 2 seconds upon hitting them using [Ice Crystal] 5 times. This effect can trigger on the same enemy once every 15 seconds.
maniaIntensifyText: Upon freezing a target, Attack is increased by 15% for 10 seconds.
criminalRecord:
The outburst of the subject's powers led to the destruction of kitchen facilities due to low temperature in Blue Ribbon Culinary School, resulting in property damage of nearly one million DisCoins. No casualties were found.

--

The subject has lost her taste and is an introvert with few friends, so she can't control her special power precisely, which may lead to accidents. Since her detention, the Bureau's unique environment has made socializing less difficult for her. The specially fortified kitchen also allows her to experiment with her power.

Most of her problems have been resolved now. She can also control her power and apply it in different areas.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Can lower the surrounding temperature by 100-150¬∞C in a few seconds, which can cause serious frostbite on living beings and irreversible damage to equipment.

+++* Awakening Signs
Claims to have lost sense of taste before graduation and cooked all night in attempt to find the sense of taste again. The emotional fluctuations accidentally awakened the not-yet controlled powers.

+++* Corruption State
Awakened not long ago. No physical and mental abnormalities have been found yet. Currently at a steady incubation period.
ecbFlavourText: "So this is what it feels like to abandon one's dreams..."
arrestRec1: Caused chaos in the school kitchen with her powers and revealed her identity as a Sinner. The MBCC received a report from the school and sent a team to pick the subject up.
arrestRec2: The parents work for Nirvana Transport away from home all the time. The two generations lack communication. After discovering the subject's love for cooking, the parents sent the subject to Blue Ribbon Culinary School and provided sufficient financial support, but were unaware of the subject's loss of sense of taste.
arrestRec3: During the subject's studies at Blue Ribbon Culinary School, the subject failed all subjects apart from iced desserts due to the subject's loss of sense of taste, and had to repeat for three consecutive years. The fourth final exams were only passed with the school's permission, but the subject eventually was expelled from school due to the identity of a Sinner.
arrestRec4: Born with a lack of taste and can only taste dishes at extremely low temperatures, which is a tremendous hindrance in culinary studies. However, the exam stress had led to a complete loss of taste. Now, the subject can only taste food that has a temperature close to liquid nitrogen.
servingTerm1: Due to the subject's special diet, the MBCC logistics department prepared special low temperature recipes for her, which still failed to meet her needs. Due to personality flaws, the subject dares not to voice her opinion but only sneak into the kitchen late at night to get extra meals.
servingTerm2: Extremely cooperative with missions but rarely able to complete them. Often starts to carry out missions without fully understanding the mission. Due to the repeated mistakes and panic, Sinners with fire abilities were arranged to deal with the ice accident.
servingTerm3: Extremely passionate about making ice cream and has received a lot of praise from Sinners who have a sweet tooth. The subject's loner personality was improved through ice cream.
servingTerm4: New ice cream was created, and a chair was added to the kitchen, which was said to be the Chief's reserved tasting seat. But because the subject "hesitated whether to invite the Chief" for too long, when the Chief tried the ice cream, it had already melted into a milkshake.
emotionCheck1:
[Kelvin greets you while holding food ingredients in her arms.]

**Kelvin:** Chief, do you think we can install an additional freezer in the Bureau's kitchen?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** We can add one small refrigerator. And it'll have to be an energy-saving model.
 * **Kelvin:** In that case, I think we can put more vegetables.
 * **Kelvin:** üòò

* **Prompt:** There isn't enough space. Last time [[[Ignis]]] wanted to add a cooktop. That didn't happen either.
 * **Kelvin:** Sigh... guess I'll just have to freeze the extra food ingredients every day to keep them fresh, then.
 * **Kelvin:** üò´
emotionCheck2:
[It seems Kelvin is being laughed at.]

**Kelvin:** Oh, come on... When will I finally graduate...?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Perhaps you don't have enough credits? That's usually the reason why.
 * **Kelvin:** Sigh... Nothing gets past you.
 * **Kelvin:** üòñüòñ

* **Prompt:** Show your dishes to your instructor. He will surely give you a pass so that you can graduate.
 * **Kelvin:** Haha... If only Teacher can understand my vision.
 * **Kelvin:** üòê
supervision1:
++* ‚ö† Kitchen Accident

//You hear a loud noise from inside the kitchen.//

**System Notifications:** Kelvin, who is completely focused on her new dish, gets scared by the loud clang when the steel pot drops to the floor. As a result, she loses control of her power and destroys all the equipment in the kitchen.

* **Prompt:** Change reluctantly
supervision2:
++* ‚ö† Putting on more Clothes

//It has been cold in the Bureau lately.//

**System Notifications:** Whenever Kelvin feels gloomy, the temperature in the whole Bureau drops by a few degrees.

* **Prompt:** Put on some clothes
supervision3:
++* ‚ö† Refrigeration

//It has been very hot in the Bureau lately.//

**System Notifications:** It is midsummer. And the air conditioner in the Bureau was malfunctioning. It would take time to repair it, so you asked Kelvin to use her ability to keep the heat at bay for the night. However, things got out of hand and the temperature dropped too low. Half of the Sinners and staff in the Bureau caught colds, including Chief.

* **Prompt:** Handle with care when using a refrigeration machine in human shape.
supervision4:
++* ‚ö† Violation

//[[[Nightingale | Adjutant Nightingale]]] handed you a personnel report.//

**System Notifications:** An employee snuck out Kelvin's ice cream and sold it for money. This case has been confirmed, and Nightingale wants that employee fired.

* **Prompt:** Approve
supervision5:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† Cooking Anime

//Kelvin is watching an anime on TV with fascination.//

**System Notifications:** In the Recreation Area, Kelvin is watching an anime on TV with fascination.

**Kelvin:** Ah, it's Chief. Have you watched this anime before?

**Kelvin:** It's about a novice cook who meets a kitten cook, and the kitten hides in his uniform and tells him how to cook!

**Kelvin:** How fun is that!

**System Notifications:** Kelvin gets chatty when she talks about cooking.

**Kelvin:** If I'd also had a kitten like this, would I have been able to graduate from the culinary school?

**System Notifications:** Kelvin gives a sigh.

* **Prompt:** Your low-temperature dishes are really delicious too.

**Kelvin:** Y-you think so?

**Kelvin:** Thank you, Chief...
supervision6:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† The Taste of Snow

//You find that Kelvin keeps sticking out her tongue.//

**System Notifications:** You notice Kelvin sticking her tongue out in a corner in the Outdoor Activity Area.

**Chief:** Are you making a funny face?

**Kelvin:** Ah, Chief... No, I'm just...

**System Notifications:** Kelvin looks hesitant.

* **Prompt:** Keep asking

**Kelvin:** I, I'm tasting the snow. When it's snowing outside, sometimes it flies in through this vent.

**Chief:** Tasting the snow?

**Kelvin:** Y-yes. Snow actually comes in different flavors. Like, it tastes sweet in December and faintly aromatic in January and February...

**Kelvin:** Ordinary people can't really taste the difference, but for someone like me who only eats chilled food, it's a very rich gustatory experience.

**Chief:** I understand.

**Kelvin:** Chief, I have a favor to ask...

**Chief:** What?

**Kelvin:** Please don't tell others about this! I'm worried they might laugh at me...

* **Prompt:** Promise her

**Kelvin:** Th-thank you, Chief!
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
If possible, I'd like to stay in the kitchen, preferably in cold storage... ah, sorry! I didn't mean to trouble you. I promise not to do anything weird.

[Raise to Phase 1]
Shiver... was that what it feels like in absolute zero?

[Raise to Phase 3]
From now on, whether in cooking or in battle, I will never doubt myself again!

[Level Start]
There's got to be a better candidate than me... right?

[Win Battles]
We survived...! Thanks to everyone's efforts.

[Lose Battles]
I always mess things up...

[Ultimate Skill]
Please don't come over here!

[Die in Battles]
It's so cold...

[Greeting]
It's a bit hot today... Chief, I concocted a new flavor of shaved ice. Want to try it? You won't be disappointed.

[Conversation 1]
Chief, you know which vegetable has the worst eyesight? ... They all have equally bad eyesight, because vegetables don't have eyes! Haha... ha... I'm sorry I suck at everything...!

[Conversation 2]
I can't taste hot dishes, yet I dream of becomnig a chef... sorry, you must think I'm weird.

[Conversation 3]
The DisCity Blue Ribbon Culinary School is the most prestigious cooking school of all time. Every student here will  become a celebrity chef one day... everyone except me. I've repeated the same grade for three years already and still haven't been able to graduate...

[Special Conversation 1]
To pass the exams and be accepted by everyone, I turned my back on the recipes that had accompanied me all life. I learned "normal" recipes and made what I could never taste... later, I obtained my degree, but lost something more precious.

[Special Conversation 2]
I know my recipes aren't the kind that everyone likes... but... low-temperature dishes have their own unique flavors. I really don't want to give up on them!

[Special Conversation 3]
It's scary to be "different from everyone else"... if everyone else thinks something is sweet, you must also think that it's sweet... if everyone else thinks something is sour, you must also think that it's sour... otherwise, you'll become the weirdo...

[Full Compliance]
Thank you, Chief, for giving me a place to stay. Thank you for letting me cook whatever I want and for chatting with me, even though I make every conversation awkward... from now on, I will accomodate your wishes no matter what they are. I promise!

[Idle]
Looks like I'm no longer needed here. Hmmm... can I take a look in the kitchen? Just a peek.

[Annoyed]
Eek! Ch-ch-Chief... it's too hot...

[Special Attention]
Chief? Are you here to supervise me? I'm sorry, I won't use the freezer behind your back... really.

[Dispatch]
Um... can I shop for some ingredients on my way back?

[Dispatch Complete]
I'm sorry, Chief, I think... I have a heatstroke...

[Level Up]
... hmm? I think I sensed a bit of taste!
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
This feels nice... Ah! Ch-Chief! Wh... when did you come? I'm sorry, but can I please stay here for a bit longer...? I'll definitely clean up the fridge later!

[Greeting]
Chief, would you care to join me? It's different from the icehouse of the Blue Ribbon Culinary School. It doesn't give you goosebumps at all! It feels just right.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
If anyone saw me like this, words about being a "giant weirdo" will surely be spread even further.  What? You think it's not bad? Hehehe... That's nice.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
I've got an idea! Before we go out to the pool, why don't we make some snow cones with these fruits? They'll be perfect for relieving summer heat!

[Idle] 
One day, the strawberry cone and the chocolate cone swam together in a race. Guess who won? The answer is neither, because they both melted in the sea! Ah... I'm sorry... I must be delirious from the heat to tell this horrible joke... You don't have to force yourself to laugh!

[Annoyed]
Oh! Your hands are so cold, not quite the same as usual! It seems to be even more chilling than liquid nitrogen!

[Special Attention] 
I thought I'd packed the right clothes for summer, but they are still not cool enough. I was this close to becoming one of the water vaporizers...

[Level Up}
That'll bring the temperature down...

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Self-Betrayal
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: The speed reduction effect for enemies in the [Frigid Zone] can now stack. When the effect has stacked 4 times, it freezes the enemy for 1/1.5/2 second.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText: "So this is what it feels like to abandon one's dreams..."

maniaIntensify.title: Cold Food
maniaIntensify.text: Upon freezing a target, Attack is increased by 15% for 10 seconds.

crimebrandSets.name: Solo Dance
crimebrandSets.note: Increase normal attack damage and ultimate damage. Make sure she is close the enemy when ulting and further away when normal attacking.

crimebrandSets.name: Team buff
crimebrandSets.note: Buff the team's damage when she ults.

crimebrandSets.name: Alternative
crimebrandSets.note: A very cheap alternative for if you have none of the other options available.

shackles.title: Streamline
shackles.description: [Frigid Zone] Speed reduction effect increased by 10%.

shackles.title: Freezer
shackles.description: [Frost]: When this mark takes effect, the attacker is frozen for 2 seconds.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

shackles.title: Streamline
shackles.description: [Frigid Zone] Speed reduction effect is increased by 10%.

skills.name: Ice Crystal
skills.description: Kelvin attacks with ice crystals, dealing (114% of Attack damage) Magic Damage each time.

skills.name: Frigid Zone
skills.description: Kelvin creates a [Frigid Zone] in the target area, dealing (180% of her Attack) Magic Damage to enemies within range per second and reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds, during which she can't automatically recover her energy.

skills.name: Frozen Freshness
skills.description: Kelvin creates a diamond-shaped [Low Temperature Field] around herself. The Movement Speed of enemies inside will be reduced by 20%.

skills.name: Frost
skills.description: During a battle, Kelvin automatically covers an allied Sinner with the lowest percentage of HP with [Frost], gaining 28% damage reduction. After taking damage, [Frost] is removed. The effect has a 15-second cooldown.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Defense +2, Attack +4
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Defense +2, Attack +4, Unlock Requirements: Dispatch Kelvin 10 times
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Requirements: Kelvin's Shackle Sync Rate increased to 5
Unlock Voice: Obedience Full, Unlock Sinner Title: Absolute Zero

voicelines.Greeting - EN: Chief, would you care to join me? It's different from the icehouse of the Blue Ribbon Culinary School. It doesn't give you goosebumps at all! It feels just right.
voicelines.Greeting - KR: Íµ≠Ïû•Îãò ÌïúÎ≤à Îì§Ïñ¥ÏôÄ Î≥¥Ïã§ÎûòÏöî? Ïó¨Í∏¥ Î∏îÎ£®Î¶¨Î≥∏ ÏöîÎ¶¨ÏÇ¨ ÏïÑÏπ¥Îç∞ÎØ∏Ïùò ÎÉâÏû•Í≥†ÏôÄ Îã§Î•¥Í≤å ÏóÑÏ≤≠ Ï∂•ÏßÄÎèÑ ÏïäÍ≥†, Îî± Ï†ÅÎãπÌïú Ïò®ÎèÑÏòàÏöî!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: If anyone saw me like this, words about me being a "giant weirdo" will surely be spread even further. What? You think it's not bad? Hehehe... That's nice.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: Ï†Ä Ïù¥Îü¨Í≥† ÏûàÎäî Í±∞ ÏÇ¨ÎûåÎì§Ïù¥ Î≥¥Î©¥ Ï†ÄÏùò 'Í¥¥Ïßú' Î†àÎ≤®Ïù¥ Îòê Ïò¨ÎùºÍ∞ÄÍ≤†Ï£†? Ïñ¥ÎïåÏöî‚Ä¶? Í¥úÏ∞ÆÎã§Í≥†Ïöî? Ìó§Ìó§‚Ä¶ Í∑∏Îüº Îã§ÌñâÏù¥ÏóêÏöî‚Ä¶
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: I've got an idea! Before we go out to the pool, why don't we make some snow cones with these fruits? They'll be perfect for relieving summer heat!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: Ï¢ãÏùÄ ÏÉùÍ∞ÅÏù¥ ÎÇ¨Ïñ¥Ïöî! Ïù¥Îî∞Í∞Ä ÏàòÏòÅÏû•Ïóê ÎÜÄÎü¨ Í∞à Îïå, Ïó¨Í∏∞ ÏûàÎäî Í≥ºÏùºÎ°ú ÎπôÏàò Ìï¥ÏÑú Î®πÏñ¥Ïöî, ÏãúÏõêÌïú Í±∞ Î®πÏúºÎ©¥ ÎçîÏúÑÍ∞Ä Ïãπ Í∞ÄÏã§ Í±∞ÏòàÏöî!
voicelines.Idle - EN: One day, the strawberry cone and the chocolate cone swam together in a race. Guess who won? The answer is neither, because they both melted in the sea! Ah... I'm sorry... I must be delirious from the heat to tell this horrible joke... You don't have to force yourself to laugh!
voicelines.Idle - KR: Ïñ¥Îäê ÎÇ† Îî∏Í∏∞ Îßõ ÏïÑÏù¥Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î¶ºÏù¥ Ï¥àÏΩî Îßõ ÏïÑÏù¥Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î¶ºÍ≥º ÏàòÏòÅ ÏãúÌï©ÏùÑ ÌñàÏñ¥Ïöî. Ìïú Î≤à ÏïåÏïÑÎßûÌòÄ Î≥¥ÏÑ∏Ïöî, ÎàÑÍ∞Ä Î®ºÏ†Ä Í≤∞ÏäπÏ†êÏóê ÎèÑÏ∞©ÌñàÏùÑÍπåÏöî? Ï£Ñ, Ï£ÑÏÜ°Ìï¥Ïöî‚Ä¶ Ï†ÄÎäî ÎÇ†Ïî®Í∞Ä ÎÑàÎ¨¥ ÎçîÏõåÏÑú Í∑∏ÎÉ• Ìïú Î≤à‚Ä¶ ÏñµÏßÄÎ°ú ÏõÉÏúºÏã§ ÌïÑÏöî ÏóÜÏñ¥Ïöî!
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Oh! Your hands are so cold, not quite the same as usual! It seems to be even more chilling than liquid nitrogen! Hmm? Is this... the power of the shackles? Amazing!

voicelines.Special Attention - EN: I thought I'd packed the right clothes for summer, but they are still not cool enough. I was this close to becoming one of the water vaporizers...
